title: Sound On: Subway Shooting Investigation
itunes:title: Sound On: Subway Shooting Investigation
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Former NYC Mayor, Bill de Blasio, Bloomberg reporter Kriti Gupta, Jamil Jaffer, director of the National Security Institute at George Mason University's Antonin Scalia Law School, Bloomberg politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Chapin Fay, founder of Lighthouse Public Affairs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
